```{r, echo=FALSE}

#this is only slightly modified from Francois Michonneau's code found here https://github.com/fmichonneau/evol2015-tweets

library(devtools)
library(twitteR)
#add your twitter API authorization info here
#see https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/twitteR/README.html
#you will need to create an app at https://dev.twitter.com/ to get Twitter API OAuth values

api_key <- "your api_key here"
api_secret <- "your api_secret here"
access_token <- "your access_token here"
access_token_secret <- "your access_token_secret here"
setup_twitter_oauth(api_key,api_secret,access_token,access_token_secret)

require(base64enc)
tweets<-searchTwitter("#yourhashtag", n=10000)
dftweets<-twListToDF(tweets)
#saveRDS(tweets, "raw_tweets.rds")
write.csv(dftweets, "scrapedtweets.csv", row.names=FALSE)

```
